    • login

      public boolean login​(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password) throws WrongCredentialsException
      Login validate email and password (currently hard-coded)
      Specified by:
      login in class ClientFacade
      Parameters:
      email - Admin's email
      password - Admin's password
      Returns:
      Boolean if log in succeeds
      Throws:
      WrongCredentialsException - When email/password not exist or match
      See Also:
      LoginManager

    • addNewCompany

      public long addNewCompany​(Company company) throws NameExistException, EmailExistException, CrudException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Adds a new company to the database only if the email and the name are not exist in the database
      Parameters:
      company - A company object (id param is not required)
      Returns:
      The generated company id
      Throws:
      NameExistException - If the company's name already exist in the database
      EmailExistException - If the company's email already exist in the database
      CrudException - If there is any SQL exception
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • updateCompany

      public void updateCompany​(Company company) throws UpdateException, CrudException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Updates an existing company in the database (company name cannot be updated)
      Parameters:
      company - A company object (id param required)
      Throws:
      UpdateException - If the user trying to update the company name
      CrudException - If there is any SQL exception
      java.lang.InterruptedException
